subTitle: Ask us anything about our platform, and get factual responses.

faqs.question: Is it obligatory to apply through our support team?
faqs.answer: No, it’s not obligatory. We present various opportunities such as scholarships, fellowships, and internships. You have the choice to apply on your own or through our support team. However, applying with our team significantly increases your chances of acceptance, as we ensure that your application is polished and competitive.

faqs.question: Are these opportunities only for individuals from Arab countries?
faqs.answer: No, these opportunities are open to anyone seeking great opportunities. While our primary focus is on Arab students and individuals, we welcome applicants from all backgrounds.

faqs.question: Does your support team provide guidance and support for the visa process, or only for application submission?
faqs.answer: Our support doesn’t end with the application process. Once you choose to apply through our team, we handle everything—from application submission to visa processing and any other necessary requirements after acceptance.

faqs.question: How do I know which opportunities are right for me?
faqs.answer: Our platform offers personalized recommendations based on your profile and interests. You can also consult with our team to help you choose the most suitable opportunities.

faqs.question: What types of opportunities are available on Nobda?
faqs.answer: We offer a wide range of opportunities, including scholarships, internships, PhD programs, job listings, cultural exchanges, and funded conferences across various fields.

faqs.question: How do I start the application process?
faqs.answer: You can begin by creating a profile on our platform, exploring available opportunities, and choosing whether to apply independently or with the support of our expert team.

faqs.question: What is the cost of using your support services?
faqs.answer: Our basic platform services are free, but there may be fees associated with personalized support and application assistance. Please contact our team for specific pricing details.

faqs.question: How do I track the status of my application?
faqs.answer: If you apply through our support team, we provide regular updates and notifications on the progress of your application, including any necessary follow-up actions.
